pilgrimages.name: Camino de Santiago
pilgrimages.description: The ancient pilgrimage route to the shrine of Saint James in Santiago de Compostela, walked by millions seeking spiritual renewal.
pilgrimages.spiritualFocus: Penance, reflection, and spiritual transformation through walking meditation
pilgrimages.lilasBloom: Wild lavender fields bloom along the path in late spring, creating purple carpets of divine beauty

pilgrimages.name: Via Francigena
pilgrimages.description: The ancient pilgrimage route from Canterbury to Rome, following the footsteps of Archbishop Sigeric in 990 AD.
pilgrimages.spiritualFocus: Following apostolic tradition and connecting with early Christian heritage
pilgrimages.lilasBloom: Alpine violets and mountain lilacs create mystical purple pathways through the Swiss Alps

pilgrimages.name: Fatima Pilgrimage
pilgrimages.description: Pilgrimage to the Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima, site of the 1917 Marian apparitions to three shepherd children.
highlights: Basilica of Our Lady of the Rosary
pilgrimages.spiritualFocus: Marian devotion, prayer of the rosary, and consecration to the Immaculate Heart
pilgrimages.lilasBloom: Portuguese lavender surrounds the sanctuary, filling the air with heavenly fragrance during prayer

pilgrimages.name: Lourdes Pilgrimage
pilgrimages.description: Pilgrimage to the Grotto of Massabielle where Our Lady appeared to Saint Bernadette, seeking healing and grace.
pilgrimages.spiritualFocus: Healing, both physical and spiritual, through the intercession of Our Lady
pilgrimages.lilasBloom: Wild irises bloom near the grotto in spring, their purple petals reflecting divine mercy

pilgrimages.name: Mount Kailash Kora
pilgrimages.description: Sacred circumambulation of Mount Kailash, considered holy by multiple faiths including Christianity through ancient traditions.
pilgrimages.spiritualFocus: Purification, meditation, and connection with the divine through extreme devotion
pilgrimages.lilasBloom: Rare Himalayan blue poppies create ethereal purple-blue meadows at high altitudes
